title: Strange Acquaintance (CRE205)
description:
A Classic RISK! episode from our first two years! In the fifth episode from our second season, Rob Delaney, Andres du Bouchet, Joe Frank, Sara Barron and David Crabb share stories of curious connections made with unlikely associates.

Support RISK! on Patreon at Patreon.com/RISK

Make a one-time donation to RISK! at PayPal.me/RISKshow

Get tickets to RISK! live shows at RISK-show.com/tour

Get the RISK! book at TheRISKBook.com

Take our storytelling classes at TheStoryStudio.org

Hire Kevin Allison to make a personalized video at Cameo.com/TheKevinAllison

Hire Kevin Allison as a coach at KevinAllison.com
author: Kevin@RISK-show.com (Rob Delaney, Andres du Bouchet, Joe Frank, Sara Barron, Arms, Hollywood Kill, Sketch Clip, Miriam Garcia, Alicia Solans, MadMix Mustang, Bee vs. Moth, The Spies, Sp0ntanius, The Ettes, Do or DIY, David Crabb, People Like Us, Kevin Allison)
